name: Escape Game - FORT BOYARD 2022
description:
"Fort Boyard awaits you with numerous challenges to take-up solo, with family or even with your friends! Within the legendary fortress, you will face new dangers, solve tricky enigma, and live electrifying time trial to obtain the keys of the Treasure room detained by the Father Fouras.

To escape, you will have 4 highly motivated candidates with you. Together, you will face fierce enemies, live mind-blowing twists and do a bunch of stunts. The perfect combination for an unprecedented escape game experience!

Throw back in time with the Time Machine and experience 6 mythical challenges of the Fort! There is even a surprise guest: Willy Rovelli. Our very special French chef is also on board and it is time for a cooking contest! Ready to challenge his ""delightful cuisine""? Will you be able to escape this crazy universe and survive his horrific meals?"

  • Enjoy 44 thrilling challenges inspired by the French Game Show Fort Boyard, such as the Revolvers, the Mummy, the Temple of Doom, the Giant Nail and more.
  • Get a team just like you: customize your character and choose your battle cry to mark the Fort's history.
  • Use the Time Machine and return to the roots of the Fort to discover 6 old school tests with kitschy clothes and sepia atmosphere.
  • Try 2 challenges about "great gastronomy": Confront the delicious skills of the Chef Willy Rovelli without getting sick and cross the Ketchuperie’s moats while keeping your balance… and your dignity!
  • Various game modes are available: single player, cooperative or competitive party mode and a complete versus mode for even more fun!
  • Explore the Fort and live an unprecedented escape experience!
  • Discover new ways of cooking with the infamous chef Rovelli’s cuisine!
